rooms.primaryDescription: You're in a dark room with one visible door.
rooms.secondaryDescription:: After using the torch, you see a sparkle in one of the cracks. After investigating, you find a key

rooms.primaryDescription: This room doesn't look too different than the last
rooms.secondaryDescription:: The room is now lit up, and you hear all sorts of bugs and critters scatter into the cracks

rooms.primaryDescription: There's a door at the north end of the room, but it's locked.
rooms.secondaryDescription:: The room is now lit up, and you hear all sorts of bugs and critters scatter into the cracks
